definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

definition: ethnic groups in the north and west of China in ancient times/foreigner/barbarian
variant of 絡腮鬍子|络腮胡子[luo4 sai1 hu2 zi5]
purple qipao gown, the sign of an official position
waist of a bear and back of a tiger/tough and stocky build
